selectcategory-desc: Allows the user to select from existing categories when editing a page
selectcategory-subtitle: Shift-mouse to select multiple contiguous entries, Ctrl-mouse to select non-contiguous entries.
apihelp-selectcategory-summary: Supply the category tree related to Extension:SelectCategory for a given namespace, when activated.
apihelp-selectcategory-param-namespace: Namespace for which the category tree is generated (based on $wgSelectCategoryRoot)
